name: Handspun Cotton Yarn - FLAME - Earth Spun Vegan Yarn
description:
Flame - Bright firey red and creamy natural cotton tones

60 yards / 72 grams

Bulky Thick Thin Yarn / average 6 wpi

98% organic cotton / 2% nylon (binder thread)

----------------

Gypsies Thread Earth Spun yarns are 100% vegan and earth friendly yarns handspun from SUPER soft organic cotton. This yarn will make you LOVE cotton!

I use only high quality fiber reactive dyes insuring a colorfast yarn.

For items knit or crocheted made from Earth Spun handspun yarns, I recommend hand washing only. While all yarns are rinsed well, there may be a small amount of residual dye left on the yarn, so it is also recommended that you wash each item individually for its first washing.

I do my best to capture the accurate color of this yarn, but do be advised that every monitor will vary slightly in display.

name: MONET - Handpainted BULKY Merino Silk Yarn
description:
Monet - A subtle blend of pinks, purples, and grays.

110 yards / 100 grams

Extra Bulky - 6 wpi

70% Merino / 20% silk / 10% nylon

--------------

This is a delightfully decadent yarn! Super soft with lots of luster from the silk content. It is extra bulky and works up super fast.

This is a limited edition yarn!!! I have a fixed amount of this base yarn, and when its gone its gone. Don't miss out!!!!

I use only high quality fiber specific / reactive dyes insuring a colorfast yarn.

For items knit or crocheted made from this yarn, I recommend hand washing only, it WILL Felt!! 

While all yarns are rinsed well, there may be a small amount of residual dye left on the yarn, so it is also recommended that you wash each item individually for its first washing.

I do my best to capture the accurate color of this yarn, but do be advised that every monitor will vary slightly in display.

name: APPALACHIA - Super Chunky Handspun Art Yarn
description:
This is a super soft, super chunky, super fun skein of one of a kind art yarn! 

I spun the yarn from a mix of organic cotton, mohair, merino, and a touch of nylon. The yarn has a very rustic look to it, but as soon as you touch it you realize it is pure luxury!

64 yards / 140 gr / 4 3/4 oz
aprx. 3 wpi

There is plenty of yarn here for a fun funky hat, a scarf, or a set of super soft fingerless mits, or let your imagination guide you!

name: LADY M - Bulky Handspun Merino Yarn
description:
Lady M - a vibrant mix of pinks, purples, blues, and a hint of sage green

aprx. 50 yards / 50 grams

Super Bulky / handspun thick-thin / 5 wpi

100% merino

-----------------

This yarn was spun from the very BEST merino fleece I have ever spun!!! It is amazingly soft!! I hand processed the entire fleece and then spun up the whole thing. I have wound it all off into aprx. 50 gram skeins, and am dying at least 2-3 skeins per colorway. Please see coordinating handpainted commercial yarns in my shop.

I use only high quality fiber specific / reactive dyes insuring a colorfast yarn.

For items knit or crocheted made from this yarn, I recommend hand washing only, it WILL felt!!

While all yarns are rinsed well, there may be a small amount of residual dye left on the yarn, so it is also recommended that you wash each item individually for its first washing.

I do my best to capture the accurate color of this yarn, but do be advised that every monitor will vary slightly in display.

name: LADY M - Handpainted Brushed Kid Mohair Yarn
description:
Lady M - a vibrant mix of pinks, purples, blues, and a hint of sage green

150 yards / 50 grams

Bulky / 7 wpi

43% wool, 25% mohair, 17% rayon, 15% nylon

-------------

This is a lovely brushed mohair blend yarn!! Lots of fuzzy halo, very minimal shedding, and next to the skin soft!!

This is a limited edition yarn!!! I have a fixed amount of this base yarn, and when its gone its gone. Don't miss out!!!!

I use only high quality fiber specific / reactive dyes insuring a colorfast yarn.

For items knit or crocheted made from this yarn, I recommend hand washing only.

While all yarns are rinsed well, there may be a small amount of residual dye left on the yarn, so it is also recommended that you wash each item individually for its first washing.

I do my best to capture the accurate color of this yarn, but do be advised that every monitor will vary slightly in display.
